Frank,
 
P.S.
 
Good luck with the new board.
 
jeff
 
 
In a message dated 2/14/2008 11:41:37 P.M. Central Standard Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
I think I need the 12 step program for board builders! I have the  
LA1135 radio wired---already, and ready to start testing Friday 
night.  There has to be a reason I didn't use that chip, but the 
breadboarded  version seemed to work ok, but that was a couple years 
ago. The goal is to  make sure I have the best possible radio, and 
audio output, then make more  printed circuit boards. 

Frank-S

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
Marlboro63@.,  Mar
>
> If you build it they will come  ............
> 
> Jeff
> 
> 
> In a message  dated 2/13/2008 10:25:14 A.M. Central Standard Time, 
>  purplealiengirl@  purple
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  There has to be a simple way. This weekend is another three dayer, 
so I  
> think I'll do some more bread boarding. 
> 
>  Frank-S
